message.description: What do you want to tell ChatGPT?

chatgpt.rateLimit: The ratelimit has been reached. Please try again in a few seconds.
chatgpt.error: The API responded with an error.

customname.description: Set a custom nickname and I will call you that.

global.description: Should I call you like that on every server?

target.description: Who's custom nickname do you want to know?

global.description: Should I tell you your global nickname or your guild-specific one?
Should I remove your global nickname or your guild-specific one?

set.success: I will call you "{name}" from now on.

editmessage.description: Edit any message sent by the bot

channel.description: The channel the message is in.

message_id.description: The id of the message you want me to edit.

remove_attachments.description: Clear out everything on that message. eg. embeds, files

editmessage.textInputLabel: Write the new content for that message.
editmessage.notFound: There is no message with that id in the specified channel!
editmessage.notBotMessage: I can only edit my own messages!
editmessage.timedout: You took to long to reply!
editmessage.emptyJson: The JSON you provided is empty!
